text: Miguel Antonio Escobar Montalvo was a footballer from Colombia. He was born on 18 April 1945 and died on 11 April 2023. Montalvo played for the Colombia national team from 1975 to 1979. == References == == Other websites == Category:1945 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Colombian footballers Category:Valle del Cauca
title: Miguel Escobar
